sentences.en: " Oh, no, Rhett. Not anything old fashioned like these New Orleans houses.
sentences.cn: " 唔, 不好, 瑞德, 不要新奥尔良这种老式的房子.

sentences.en: A train was leaving at midnight for New Orleans.
sentences.cn: 有一班火车将于夜间十二点开往新奥尔良.

sentences.en: Best of all things in New Orleans was the food.
sentences.cn: 新奥尔良的菜肴最有名.

sentences.en: By now, Ogilvie was probably back in New Orleans and being interrogated.
sentences.cn: 奥格尔维现在可能已被带回新奥尔良,正在受审问.

sentences.en: Dancers shimmied in the streets of New Orleans.
sentences.cn: 舞者们在新奥尔良的大街上跳着希米舞。

sentences.en: Even his death, after crashing his motorcycle on a bridge in New Orleans, was spectacular.
sentences.cn: 甚至他骑摩托车在新奥尔良撞桥身亡的事也轰动一时。

sentences.en: Four steamboat loads of spectators came to view a hanging in New Orleans.
sentences.cn: 四轮船的观众来新奥尔良观看绞刑。

sentences.en: New Orleans is famous for its cuisine.
sentences.cn: 新奥尔良以其美食而著称。

sentences.en: Oil leaking from a barge in the Mississippi River poses a hazard to the drinking water of New Orleans.
sentences.cn: 密西西比河上驳船漏油事件危及新奥尔良市的饮用水。

sentences.en: Savannah, Charleston, Augusta, Richmond, New Orleans would never hurry.
sentences.cn: 萨凡纳 、 查尔斯顿 、 奥古斯塔 、 里土满 、 新奥尔良却从来不是这样.

sentences.en: The New Orleans police would by now be alerted.
sentences.cn: 新奥尔良的警察现在可能已处于待命状态.

sentences.en: The young colored population of New Orleans were much given to flirting.
sentences.cn: 新奥尔良的年轻的黑人居民很喜欢卖弄风情.

sentences.en: They rafted down the river to New Orleans.
sentences.cn: 他们乘木筏顺流而下来到新奥尔良市.

sentences.en: They were trying to make New Orleans by nightfall.
sentences.cn: 他们力图在黄昏前赶到新奥尔良。

sentences.en: Well , will you save Orleans for us, with all your bullying?
sentences.cn: 你既然这么霸道, 你去解救奥尔良好 吗 ?
